title: About hostel room selection
content: i’m going to blr to submit my documents soon. so i was wondering if we can choose our hostel rooms now or is there time for the selection to open? And what’s the process for hostel selection?

comments.body: No hostels left bro , check my last post

bro did you go and submit documents ??  
or did you send any local guardian??  
cuz I did today and they took all the registration and said as the process proceeds they will inform and tell you to book the hostel
